title: Competitive Programming Contests
description: A full-stack web platform enabling competitive programmers to train effectively by managing problem statements, code submissions, automatic result evaluations, clarifications, and announcements.

title: Fit-App (Contribution)
description: A collaborative platform designed for coaches and athletes to efficiently manage training sessions, track performance metrics, and monitor progress. The system includes a mobile app for athletes, personalized nutrition plans, structured training programs, and self-coaching features.

title: Payslip Management System (Contribution)
description: A system developed to automate the management and generation of employee payslips for Tunisian accounting firms. The project provides full payslip calculation, covering all variables such as CNSS contributions, deductions, state taxes, credits employee advances
